title: Bred by the Lumberjack
description: After chasing down a rare butterfly and getting lost in the woods, Katie, an intern for the ranger service, finds herself lost and alone in the forest as the sun goes down.But when the virginal Katie stumbles upon a lumberjack's cabin deep in the woods, she finds safety for the night in his strong arms.Drinks, dinner, and good conversations warm her heart, but nothing can prepare Katie for what her lumberjack has planned for her. And by morning, her life will be changed forever!This sexy story contains scenes of dubious consent, cherry popping, oral, vaginal & anal play, sleep sex and a lumberjack sporting MASSIVE wood!
author: Kara Black
